title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 113 - New York Deduction Of A Resident Individual
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 113 - New York Deduction Of A Resident Individual

State Regulations
§ 113.1 - New York deduction of a resident individual

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 113

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
